reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major lymphoma subtypes: Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (~12-13 per 100k) + Hodgkin lymphoma (~2.5 per 100k) = ~15.5 per 100k globally. Umbrella term with significant heterogeneity between subtypes.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
